ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF(Walkin_Apply_Unregistered_ChannelPartner__c ==true,OR(ISBLANK(Walkin_Unregistered_ChannelPartner_Name__c ),ISBLANK(Walkin_UnregisteredChannelPartner_Mobile__c )),false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill up the walkin unregistered broker detail.
